Entities.Name: Observation (OBS)
Entities.Definition: Represents a clinical observation related to measuring, questioning, evaluating or observing a patient or a specimen.
Entities.Sample Data: "MRI findings are limited by the presence of a bicompartmental prosthesis, which impairs the diagnosis."

Entities.Name: Clinical Finding (CLI)
Entities.Definition: Represents a specific pathological condition, typically defined by a particular name without further terms except those related to certainty, extent, and anatomical location.
Entities.Sample Data: "Quadriceps tendon and patellar tendon tendinosis is noted."

Entities.Name: Anatomical Location (LOC)
Entities.Definition: Represents an adjective or noun modifier of anatomical location used to denote the area where an observation is made or a disease is found.

Entities.Name: Certainty (CER)
Entities.Definition: Represents a certainty modifier that determines whether an entity is absent.

Entities.Name: Change (CHG)
Entities.Definition: Represents a modifier of change in the status of an entity, typically in the form of an adjective.
Entities.Sample Data: "Grade III femoropatellar cartilage wear with resorption lacunae."

Entities.Name: Characteristics (CHS)
Entities.Definition: Represents a feature modifier typically characterizing observation entities by adjectives.

Entities.Name: Size (SIZ)
Entities.Definition: Is a size modifier and mostly identifies numerical values and reported units of measurement.
Entities.Sample Data: "Fibroma in the distal third of the femur and proximal third of the tibia, approximately 25 mm in craniocaudal diameter."

Dataset.Name: IRCCS SYNLAB SDN database
Dataset.Details: A dataset of 750 MRI knee reports used to train and evaluate the models for text classification and named entity recognition. The reports were anonymized and stored in a Microsoft SQL Server virtual machine.

Annotation Guidelines.Details: Manual annotation was conducted by a clinical expert using the keywords and their combinations defined for the named entity recognition task. Annotations were made in the pre-processed reports, associating words with the corresponding tags to identify relationships between words and specified entities.
